QuestData.Title: The Ancient Brazier
QuestData.Description: What do we have here? A $r? Come to steal our land with your honeyed tongue and promises?$B$BYou do not fool me. I have lived a long time, and I know what dealing with your kind means. But the khans do not listen to their elders like they used to.$B$BSince you are here, I will put you to use. When the waters rushed in, the great water spirit, Aquarian, doused the Ancient Brazier deep inside of Splithoof Hold.$B$BUse this brand to reignite the brazier. Aquarian is sure to come. Bring me the Sacred Flame.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He snuffed out the Ancient Brazier! He has the Sacred Flame!
QuestData.LogDescription: Reignite the Ancient Brazier and obtain the Sacred Flame.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have the Sacred Flame? Do not speak to me unless you do, $r!
QuestData.RewardText: You did this favor to ingratiate yourself with me, but I will not sing your praises.$B$BI know what is to come. Where the sea failed, the great air spirit will strike you and your people down for your many transgressions against the elements.$B$BBegone from my sight!
